title: Warm potato salad with herb dressing

default: salt and freshly ground black pepper
200g/7oz new potatoes, cooked and halved, still warm

steps: In a bowl, whisk together the oil, vinegar and Dijon mustard. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste, and stir in the chives.
Stir the warm cooked new potatoes into the dressing and serve warm.
